alert.note: Alert for South Central Pinal County including Eloy, Picacho Peak State Park; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 6:31PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Pima and southwestern Pinal Counties through 715 PM MST... At 631 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Picacho Peak State Park, or 21 miles west of Marana, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marana, Eloy, Avra Valley, Picacho, Chui-Chu, Picacho Peak State Park, Picture Rocks, Red Rock, Cactus Forest, Cockleburr, Shopishk, East Chui-Chu and Silver Bell. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 206 and 234. Route 79 between mile markers 119 and 128. Route 87 between mile markers 116 and 124. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: South Central Pinal County including Eloy, Picacho Peak State Park; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail
